channel.title: TailorMeSwiftly.com Release Notes
channel.description: Latest updates and new features for TailorMeSwiftly.com — the AI-powered resume tailoring tool.

item.title: v3.4.0 — Kanban Tracker, Notes & Company Intel
item.description:
• Kanban Application Tracker: Your applications now live on a full drag-and-drop Kanban board with five columns — Tailored, Applied, Interviewing, Offer, and Rejected.
  • Click-to-Open Cards: Click any Kanban card to open a detail modal with notes, a "Go to Application" button, and Save/Cancel controls.
  • Application Notes: Add free-form notes to any application — interview dates, contact names, follow-up reminders.
  • Interview Details: Cards in the Interviewing column surface structured fields for interview date, contacts, and follow-ups.
  • Company Intel: The Introduction Email page now auto-fetches recent news and insights about your target company.
  • Light Theme Default: The app now defaults to light mode for new users.
  • UI Polish: Opaque dropdown menus, wider navigation labels, and improved auth session handling.

item.title: v3.3.0 — Past Applications & History
item.description:
• Past Applications: All your generated resumes, cover letters, interview Q&A, and outreach emails are now automatically saved to your account.
  • One-Click Restore: Instantly reload any previous application's outputs without re-generating.
  • Incremental Saves: When you generate a cover letter, interview questions, or outreach email on-demand, the save updates automatically.
  • History Navigation: Quick links to Past Applications are now available throughout the app.

item.title: v3.2.0 — Voice, Reliability & Design
item.description:
• ElevenLabs TTS: Mock interview questions are now read aloud using a premium ElevenLabs AI voice, with browser TTS as a fallback.
  • Reliable Job URL Fetching: Pasting a job listing URL now fetches through our own server, replacing old third-party proxies.
  • Resume Quick Presets: Redesigned preset buttons with color-coded accent dots.
  • Use Last Resume: Returning users can instantly load their previously uploaded resume.
  • Results Page Refresh: Updated header and background to match the main app's look and feel.
  • Improved Skill Chips: Missing skills now have higher-contrast colors in both themes.
  • Personalized Greeting: A "Hi, [Name]" greeting now appears under your avatar.

item.title: v3.1.0 — UX Polish & Improvements
item.description:
• 10 Mock Interview Questions: Increased from 8 to 10 tailored interview questions.
  • Improved Text-to-Speech: More natural voice delivery with optimized rate and pitch.
  • Dark Resume Preset: New high-contrast "Dark" theme for maximum readability.
  • Results Grid Layout: All 4 outputs now display in a single row.
  • Updated Homepage: Cleaner header design with TailorMeSwiftly.com branding above the animation.
  • Removed LinkedIn Optimization: Streamlined feature set to focus on core strengths.
  • Enhanced Loading Experience: Improved funny quotes display.
  • Messaging Refresh: Updated homepage copy to highlight lightning-fast results.

item.title: v3.0.0 — Major Update
item.description:
• Gaps Assistant: Renamed and refined the skill gap analysis step.
  • Mock Interview Mode: Hear questions read aloud with TTS. Practice one at a time with AI-powered feedback on recorded answers.
  • On-Demand Generation: Interview prep and email drafts generate only when you click their tab, making initial tailoring faster.
  • Application Tracker Fix: Kanban board now loads from the cloud with persistent drag-and-drop.
  • Resume Versions: All tailored resumes saved with version names. View and reload any past version.
  • Saved Jobs: Bookmark job descriptions and tailor resumes against them later.
  • Career Profile: Store a master career history in Preferences.
  • Loading Redesign: Full-screen centered loading overlay with blurred background.
  • Preferences Dropdown: Accessible from a clean dropdown on your profile avatar.
  • Generation Timeout: API calls now have timeouts with retry buttons.

item.title: v2.1.0 — Missing Skills Analysis Engine
item.description:
• Design Customization: Granularly tweak typography, accent colors, and layout spacing.
  • Target Company Preset: Extracts brand colors of your targeted company and injects them into your resume.
  • Missing Skills Extraction: Automated extraction of job requirements missing from your resume.
  • AI Co-Pilot Integration: Select missing skills you possess and our engine weaves them into your bullet points.
  • Bug Fix: Resolved the routing issue where the Application Tracker blanked out.
